content.rendered:
This item has a minimum order quantity of 10.

The Nene Sofa Bed has fresh, clean lines with contemporary chrome feet. Ideal for any modern environment.

Made with a pine structure and high density foam for total integrity, support and comfort.

The Nene folds out into a comfortable double bed, ideal for care homes, hospices & hospitals as well as hotels and holiday lodges..

When folded out the backrest automatically hides under the mattress, which means nothing needs to be removed by the user. Mechanism is made from steel.

Available in a choice of materials to suit your style and requirements. Comes with a 2 year guarantee.

Mattress Info: 28kg, Soft with Aloe Vera Cover. 2050 long x 1400 wide x 110mm thick.

10LM Needed Per Sofa.
